title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: There is no absolute government who wants to take the country for themselves will survive it. What is happening in Nigeria is inhumane. The government has decided to rendered the country useless by impoverishing the citizens. The whole country is under pressures, the country's general elections is coming up on 25th of this February but before now the policies was changed concerning their currency in order to reduced the high smuggling of cash by politician who will wants to use it and intimidate their counterparts.But in due time, the government ask the citizens to stop using old money when the new currency is not in circulation. Banks refused to give out new notes and refused to collect old notes from the citizens or better still banks aligned with POS agents, POS took over the banking work and charge the citizens high for any withdrawal but the worst of it is that today as am speaking no single in the country, people cannot buy or sell, everybody is confused of what next to do.Citizens have start protest in different States in order to reduced the level of masses suffering in the street of the country. Government needs to understand that's the interest of the citizens they're ruling and leading, not making politics to look like national interest for selfish reason.
